meanings.sent1: The storm will redamage the roof that was just repaired.
meanings.sent2: If you drop your phone, you might redamage the screen.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally redamaged the cake while trying to fix it.
meanings.sent4: The careless driver managed to redamage the freshly painted fence.
meanings.sent5: Be careful not to redamage the fragile package when moving it.

meanings.sent1: The old car will redamage easily if not taken care of.
meanings.sent2: If you don't fix the leak, the ceiling will redamage.
meanings.sent3: The toy was so delicate that it redamaged every time it was played with.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it would redamage if she went through another breakup.
meanings.sent5: The wound started to redamage when he accidentally bumped into the table.
